item.description: Importing FreeCAD models to Blender Using Blender v2.8 to smooth out FreeCAD models Preferences > Add-ons > Enable Import STL Add Modifier > Edge Split (Generate Category) Smooth Shade (Object Menu: Shade Smooth)
